marketplaces.name: hanzo-personas
marketplaces.description: Legendary programmer personalities - 117+ personas with OCEAN profiles, philosophies, and tool preferences
marketplaces.repo_description: Persona framework — loaders, schemas, and validation tools for personality profiles

files..claude-plugin/marketplace.json:
{
  "name": "hanzo-personas",
  "owner": {
    "name": "Hanzo AI",
    "email": "dev@hanzo.ai",
    "url": "https://hanzo.ai"
  },
  "metadata": {
    "description": "Legendary programmer personalities - 117+ personas with OCEAN profiles, philosophies, and tool preferences",
    "version": "1.0.0"
  },
  "plugins": [
    {
      "name": "hanzo-pioneers",
      "source": "./",
      "description": "Computing pioneers - Ada Lovelace, Grace Hopper, Alan Turing, Edsger Dijkstra (12 personas)",
      "version": "1.0.0",
      "author": {

        "email": "dev@hanzo.ai",
        "url": "https://github.com/hanzoai"

      "homepage": "https://github.com/hanzoai/persona",
      "repository": "https://github.com/hanzoai/persona",
      "license": "MIT",
      "keywords": ["pioneers", "history", "ada-lovelace", "grace-hopper", "alan-turing"],
      "category": "personalities",
      "strict": false,
      "agents": [
        "./personalities/ada_lovelace.md"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "hanzo-polyglot",
      "source": "./",

files.README.md:
# Persona

Framework for loading, validating, and working with personality profiles.

Provides loaders (Rust, TypeScript, Python), JSON schemas, and CLI tools
for the [Hanzo Personas](https://github.com/hanzoai/personas) dataset.

## Install

```bash
# Python
pip install hanzo-persona

# Node.js
npm install @hanzo/persona

# Rust
cargo add hanzo-persona
```

## Usage

```python
from persona import load, get

# Load all personas
personas = load()

# Get a specific persona
feynman = get("feynman")
print(feynman.traits.openness)  # 0.95
```

```typescript
import { PersonaLoader } from '@hanzo/persona'

const loader = new PersonaLoader()
const feynman = loader.get('feynman')
console.log(feynman.traits.openness) // 0.95
```

```rust
use hanzo_persona::PersonaLoader;

let loader = PersonaLoader::default();
let feynman = loader.get("feynman").unwrap();
println!("{}", feynman.traits.openness); // 0.95
```

## Schemas

- `schemas/personality.schema.json` — JSON Schema for profile validation
- `schemas/persona_schema.yaml` — YAML schema for PERSONA.md frontmatter

## Tools

- `scripts/validate.js` — validate profiles against schema
- `scripts/split-personalities.js` — split bulk data into individual files
- `tools/unix_tools.yaml` — tool preference definitions

## Data

Persona data (707 JSON profiles + 14 PERSONA.md files) lives in
[hanzoai/personas](https://github.com/hanzoai/personas).

## License

MIT
